nodes.text: Mastakatorus Darriovof III was a male nerf rancher who worked on the planet Corellia during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. Using the title of "Baron", Darriovof controlled nerf ranches built on the plains found at the base of some mountain ranges on Corellia. He made a handsome profit selling the meat from his ranches throughout the Corellian system.

Mastakatorus Darriovof III was first mentioned in Suns of Fortune, a sourcebook released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying system. The book does not clarify his species.
